bug.author: zabbasi
bug.description: Latest notebook controller has dependency on Istio. Currently since some of deployment e2e test workflows do not install Istio (e.g., kfctl-go-iap) any pr updating notebook-controller image stops at presubmit test. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/issues/3306>#3306</denchmark-link>
